long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A configurable web request logger that can be used to keeps track of what gets sent to websites that can be reviewed later.

Can be used as a passive website vulnerability scanner when used with the right settings.

At the moment it only keeps track of POST data, however, more options will follow soon.

NOW WITH LESS BUGS! :p and corrected permissions
